about.heroSubtitle: Born from practice, built by hospitality entrepreneurs, for hospitality entrepreneurs.

story.title: Our story
story.p1: Vysion Horeca was born from experience. As hospitality entrepreneurs, we noticed that existing POS systems were too expensive, too complex, and never did exactly what we needed.
story.p2: We paid for five different subscriptions: a POS, an ordering platform, accounting software, a payment terminal and analytics software. Nothing worked well together and costs ran up to hundreds of euros per month.
story.p3: That's why we decided to build it ourselves. An all-in-one platform that does exactly what a hospitality entrepreneur needs, without hassle and at a fair price.
